alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 10:18AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson and west central Arkansas Counties through 1045 AM CST... At 1018 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Linwood, or 13 miles east of Pine Bluff, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Linwood... Richardson... Cottondale... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... Lodge Corner... Cornerstone... Moscow... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
